snippet.title: Strategic Mind: The Pacific | Full Trailer | NEW STRATEGY WAR GAME 2019!
snippet.description:
#ww2, #strategy, #strategygames, #wargame, #turnbased, #midway, #pearlharbor, #guadalcanal 
Steam store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/991810/Strategic_Mind_The_Pacific

The time has come! Soon wargame fans all around the world will have the opportunity to enjoy the new turn-based strategy about World War 2 in the Pacific Ocean.

The Attack on Pearl Harbor, the Battle of Midway, the Guadalcanal Campaign, the Battle of Leyte Gulf, the Battle of Iwo Jima - all these and other memorable battles of the war between the United States of America and the Empire of Japan will be presented with historical accuracy in the naval strategy game Strategic Mind: The Pacific. While UE4 engine provides excellent 3D graphics and realistic battle scenes.

Epic naval, aerial and land battles are awaiting you. You will have various ships of the time under your command, including destroyers, cruisers, aircraft carriers and legendary battleships like Iowa and Yamato! And that is not all: marine corps, submarines, carrier-based and strategic aviation will also be among your troops. Develop your own war strategy, assemble your fleet and turn it into a truly efficient war machine!

Strategic Mind: The Pacific - is a strategy game, which allows us to see large scale conflict in the Pacific through the eyes of both sides` top commanders. Two famous admirals and relentless opponents: Chester William Nimitz and Isoroku Yamamoto will lead their fleets against each other. Whose strategic mind will prevail?

Welcome new wargame by StarniGames - Strategic Mind: The Pacific.
Two Sides. Two Commanders. Two Destinies.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarniGames
Facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/PlayStrategicMind/

Panzer Strategy is another wargame from StarniGames: https://store.steampowered.com/app/769950/Panzer_Strategy/
StarniGames site: http://starnigames.com/
